summary: Successfully tested new 'Task Management V2' and 'Project Files' features. Backend APIs working perfectly (14/14). Frontend features functional but session management needs improvement.

ui_bugs.issue: Session tokens expire too quickly, causing frequent redirects to login page during testing

passed_tests: Backend API health check (14/14 endpoints working)
All CRUD operations for projects, files, and tasks
Project Files: ARTIFACTS page loads with grid view
Project Files: File creation dialog opens and functions
Project Files: Grid layout displays files correctly
Project Files: Quick Look modal functionality verified
Task Management: MISSION CONTROL page structure verified
Task Management: Tab navigation (Kanban, Matrix, List) present
Task Management: Task creation dialog functionality
File creation with proper category selection (Mockup)
Task creation with priority and difficulty settings

success_percentage.backend: 100% (14/14 API endpoints working including files and tasks)

action_item_for_main_agent: Consider increasing JWT token expiration time or implementing token refresh mechanism to improve user experience during longer sessions. Current session expires too quickly causing workflow interruptions.
